# LoadRequest

**Class**

A resource loader that acts as a publisher.

## Declaration

```swift
class LoadRequest<Output>
```

## Getting the result

- **result**: The result of the load operation.

## Instance Methods

- **subscribe(_:)**: Attaches the specified subscriber to this publisher.

## Essentials

- **Loading entities from a file**: Retrieve an entity from storage on disk using a synchronous or an asynchronous load operation.

## Conforms To

- Publisher

items.description: The result of the load operation.
items.name: result

items.description: Attaches the specified subscriber to this publisher.
items.name: subscribe(_:)

items.description: Retrieve an entity from storage on disk using a synchronous or an asynchronous load operation.
